医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调体重对妊娠结局的影响超重是怀孕和分娩期间并发症的主要原因——这适用于在瑞典出生的女性和移居瑞典的女性，但迄今为止尚未得到充分研究。研究人员得出结论，促进健康体重的干预措施有可能预防所有女性的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Research-highlights-impact-of-body-weight-on-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Research-highlights-impact-of-body-weight-on-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f972c318-c210-4e8d-8006-5a7985d26869 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 14:00:40 -0400 Research highlights impact of body weight on pregnancy outcomes
世卫组织公布抗击登革热和伊蚊传播的虫媒病毒的综合战略今天，世界卫生组织 (WHO) 启动了全球战略准备、准备和应对计划 (SPRP)，以应对登革热和其他伊蚊传播的虫媒病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/WHO-unveils-compressive-strategy-to-combat-dengue-and-Aedes-borne-arboviruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/WHO-unveils-compressive-strategy-to-combat-dengue-and-Aedes-borne-arboviruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a8ce000-8b68-4c4e-a213-ec215836f600 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 13:16:36 -0400 WHO unveils comprehensive strategy to combat dengue and Aedes-borne arboviruses
研究调查失去常规全科医生对患者治疗结果和医疗保健使用的影响挪威的常规全科医生计划于 2001 年推出。该计划赋予所有公民在其所在城市选择全科医生的权利。这有利于医生和患者之间的个人连续性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Study-examines-impact-of-losing-a-regular-GP-on-patent-outcomes-and-healthcare-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Study-examines-impact-of-losing-a-regular-GP-on-patent-outcomes-and-healthcare-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6c15025-2555-4a64-8975-ce987dd4d6fe Thu, 03 Oct 2024 13:11:33 -0400 Study examines impact of losing a regular GP on patient outcomes and healthcare use
莱斯大学引领肥胖和糖尿病创新生物电子植入物的开发莱斯大学是多所大学研究团队的一部分，该团队已从健康高级研究计划局 (ARPA-H) 获得高达 3490 万美元的奖励，以加速生物电子植入物的开发，该植入物旨在提高肥胖和 2 型糖尿病的依从性(T2D) 处理同时降低开发和制造成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Rice-University-leads-development-of-innovative-bioelectric-implant-for-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Rice-University-leads-development-of-innovative-bioelectric-implant-for-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d74ef0fd-3092-4024-b615-f0a26cba9699 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 13:06:13 -0400 Rice University leads development of innovative bioelectronic implant for obesity and diabetes
新型半合成化合物有望对抗耐药结核病美国微生物学会杂志《微生物学光谱》发表的一项新研究表明，一种新型半合成化合物可以从天然化合物中衍生出来，对结核分枝杆菌（包括多重耐药菌株）产生有效的活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Novel-semi-synthetic-compound-shows-promise-against-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Novel-semi-synthetic-compound-shows-promise-against-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=382f88ef-f1e1-4576-b2c3-9718e97cc77e Thu, 03 Oct 2024 09:58:00 -0400 Novel semi-synthetic compound shows promise against drug-resistant tuberculosis
研究人员在阿尔茨海默病药物开发方面取得突破由兰卡斯特大学领导的国际研究小组在治疗阿尔茨海默病的药物开发方面取得了有希望的突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Researchers-make-breakthrough-in-Alzheimers-disease-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Researchers-make-breakthrough-in-Alzheimers-disease-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f9b360e-5f72-4808-aca0-a9f07fe4ee97 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 09:57:00 -0400 Researchers make breakthrough in Alzheimer's disease drug development
对动物和细胞研究进行系统评价的新指南《自然评论方法引物》上的一篇新出版物为对动物和细胞研究进行严格的系统评论提供了必要的指导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/New-guidelines-for-conducting-systematic-reviews-of-animal-and-cell-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/New-guidelines-for-conducting-systematic-reviews-of-animal-and-cell-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c49f3aef-e41a-4b94-82be-2f2eec5b2bfb Thu, 03 Oct 2024 09:20:59 -0400 New guidelines for conducting systematic reviews of animal and cell studies
有前途的研究为对抗耐药细菌带来了希望抗生素耐药细菌威胁着全球健康。然而，过去 50 年来，很少有新的抗生素进入市场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Promising-research-offers-hope-in​​-fight-against-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Promising-research-offers-hope-in​​-fight-against-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8149de79-d468-4db9-918e-0e0e73f43525 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 08:16:00 -0400 Promising research offers hope in the fight against resistant bacteria
新研究表明，富含抗氧化剂的饮食有助于降低女性不孕的风险研究表明，增加抗氧化剂的消耗可以预防女性不孕，解决生殖疾病中的氧化应激。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Antioxidant-rich-diet-could-help-lower-risk-of-infertility-in-women-new-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Antioxidant-rich-diet-could-help-lower-risk-of-infertility-in-women-new-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=deb3d6a6-7c47-46e5-b108-a54aa1de7cfb Thu, 03 Oct 2024 08:15:00 -0400 Antioxidant-rich diet could help lower risk of infertility in women, new study suggests
食物过敏患者和护理人员经历的高度心理困扰心理困扰在食物过敏患者中很常见，但阿斯顿大学研究人员共同领导的一项新研究表明，那些陷入困境的人几乎得不到支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/High-psychological-distress-experienced-by-food-allergy-病人-and-caregivers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/High-psychological-distress-experienced-by-food-allergy-病人-and-caregivers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f30cfec7-4767-4760-92a1-bcf12c91ed45 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 08:13:43 -0400 High psychological distress experienced by food allergy patients and caregivers
